snippet: The rescue was a rarity for the Police Department, whose aviation officers rarely have a chance to perform the sort of hiker-rescue operations common to more rugged jurisdictions.
abstract: New York City Police Department's aviation unit uses helicopter to rescue Amanda Graham, hiker who had broken her ankle high up on steep rock trail just north of Alpine, NJ, in Palisades Interstate Park.
lead_paragraph: The rescue was a rarity for the Police Department, whose aviation officers rarely have a chance to perform the sort of hiker-rescue operations common to more rugged jurisdictions.

headline.main: New York City Police Helicopter Rescues Injured Hiker
headline.print_headline: City Police Helicopter Rescues Injured Hiker

keywords.value: Palisades Interstate Park of NY and NJ
keywords.name: glocations
